synopsis.text:
An ordinary 13-year-old girl named Maya Kitajima harbors an extraordinary passion for acting, a talent that goes unnoticed until the legendary, yet reclusive actress Tsukikage takes her under her wing. Despite her mother's disapproval, Maya embarks on a journey to become the finest actress of her generation, leaving behind the comforts of home to attend an acting school run by the scarred former star.

As Maya's skills blossom, she faces fierce competition from Ayumi Himekawa, the stunning daughter of a celebrated acting couple, with both vying for the coveted role of the 'Crimson Goddess.' Amidst the trials and tribulations of the cutthroat entertainment industry, Maya remains steadfast in her pursuit of stardom, drawing strength from her unwavering dedication to her craft.

Intertwined with her rise to fame is a complicated relationship with the enigmatic entertainment mogul, Hayami Masumi. Despite his secret admiration for Maya, misunderstandings and bad timing conspire to keep them apart. Will Maya's unwavering determination lead her to claim the role of a lifetime and find love along the way, or will the harsh realities of show business prove too much for her dreams to handle?
